# Founder Snapshot

This public repository does not store private founder notes.

Use internal/private workspace for live founder snapshots.

# Program State Board

This public repository does not store live internal board state.

Use internal/private workspace for current program status.

# Research Backlog

This public repository does not store private research backlog entries.

Use internal/private workspace for active backlog management.

# Ideas Bin

This file is intentionally sanitized in the public repository.

Capture exploratory ideas in private workspace, then promote only approved outputs here.

# Competitive Research

Detailed competitive notes are maintained in a private workspace.

Only approved summary outputs should be published in this repository.

# Research References

Raw research references and excerpts are maintained in a private workspace.

Only curated, approved references should be published in this repository.
